items.sentence: The stewardess can speak French after a fashion.
This medicine should be taken every three hours.
Over three thousand people attended the concert.
Tom spends too much time in front of a computer.
Your love is the only thing that keeps me alive.
My rich neighbors belong to a private golf club.
Your suggestion will be rejected by the teacher.
Can anybody explain to me why this is happening?
Tom wasn't able to pay all his bills last month.
The police had their reasons for suspecting Tom.
I sensed that something bad was about to happen.
I think that you should reexamine the situation.
I didn't know that Tom had to do that yesterday.
Tom will be coming home from school early today.
Some of my friends can speak French really well.
She was in a green coat and matching mini-skirt.
She was accused of having lied about the affair.
She was always able to answer all the questions.
She was approaching thirty when I first met her.
You look like you could use a glass of lemonade.
